synopsis.text: Taketo Akutagawa, a high school student with a unique talent for writing erotic novels, enrolls at the prestigious Inspiration Academy Private High School, an institution renowned for nurturing young prodigies. Despite the school's diverse range of geniuses, Taketo stands out with his unconventional literary skills. Determined to prove his worth and become the world's greatest harem novelist, Taketo faces the challenges of school competitions and societal prejudices head-on, all while pursuing his dream of creating the perfect harem. This is a story of ambition, creativity, and the pursuit of excellence in the most unexpected ways.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
